news.title: Iran threatens 'irreparable damage' if U.S. enters Israel conflict
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump had on Tuesday called for Iran's "UNCONDITIONAL SURRENDER!" He had also called for an end to Iran's nuclear program.

news.title: Oil analysts left scratching their heads over Israel-Iran conflict: 'Your guess is as good as mine'
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump called for an "unconditional surrender" from Iran. He warned Washington's patience was wearing thin.

news.title: The Fed is likely to keep rates the same but give a forecast that moves markets. What to expect
news.summary: The meeting will feature important signals that still could move markets. While any movement on interest rates seems improbable, the meeting will have important signals.

news.title: Stellantis' Ram brand to offer industry-leading pickup truck warranty as part of turnaround plan
news.summary: The warranty covers the engine, transmission, transfer case, driveshafts, differentials, and axles for 10 years or 100,000 miles, whichever comes first.

news.title: Sam Altman says Meta offered OpenAI staff $100 million bonuses, as Mark Zuckerberg ramps up AI poaching efforts
news.summary: Meta had sought to hire "a lot of people" from OpenAI. "So far none of our best people have decided to take them up on that," Sam Altman said.

news.title: Housing starts plummet to a five-year low as buyers stay on the sidelines
news.summary: Rising inventory levels and weak buyer demand have resulted in homes sitting on the market for longer. Rising inventory levels have led to a shortage of homes for sale in the U.S.

news.title: Trump’s pick to replace Fed Chair Powell could rock your mortgage and retirement. Buckle up.
news.summary: Understanding the president's thinking could protect your financial future. The president is testing the Fed’s limits —understanding his thinking could help you.

news.title: This steelmaker gives a bullish outlook two weeks after higher tariffs took effect
news.summary: Nucor’s stock surges after a bullish profit outlook, two weeks after higher steel tariffs took effect. Nucor is the largest U.S. steelmaker.

news.title: U.S. added more than 1,000 millionaires every day last year, new report says
news.summary: The world is getting richer, but different places are doing it at different speeds. The U.S. is one of the fastest growing economies in the world.

news.title: Jobless claims move lower, easing some concerns about labor market health
news.summary: Claims have moved higher since mid-May, according to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics. Claims have been rising since the start of the year, the agency says.
